articles.title: Gary Neville doubts Arsenal's Premier League title credentials due to reputation for 'crumbling' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Neville insisted that the Gunners have shown in recent years a propensity to 'crumble' at the tail end of the campaign, and until they can prove otherwise he has doubts over their credentials.
articles.content: Gary Neville is no convinced that Arsenal will mount any serious threat to Manchester City's pursuit of a third consecutive Premier League title, despite the flying start made by Mikel Arteta's side.… [+3264 chars]
